p: Several studies examined the antioxidant capacity of onion essential oils and extracts using different methods including diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), β-carotene bleaching assays, azinobis (3-ethyl-benzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid) (ABTS), oxygen radical absorbance capacity (ORAC) and Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity (TEAC); findings confirmed remarkable antioxidant activity for the plant (Benkeblia 2005; Kim et al. 2010; Santas et al. 2010; Ye et al. 2013; Lisanti et al. 2016; Fredotović et al. 2017).
